title: Ordinary least squares - Wikipedia
snippet:
In statistics, ordinary least squares (OLS) is a type of linear least squares method 
for estimating the unknown parameters in a linear regression model.
htmlSnippet:
In statistics, ordinary least squares (OLS) is a type of linear least squares method
for estimating the unknown parameters in a linear regression model.
